summary: we analysed data of people at risk of MERS transmission including 228 in the emergency department (ED) and 218 in general wards (GW) data of personnel location and movement, personal protection equipment and hand hygiene was recorded. the index patient was an old patient admitted to our hospital. trial registration NCT02605109, date of registration: 11th November 2015. trial registration NCT02605109, date of registration: 11th November 2015.
